articles.description: Sportsmail reported earlier this week that the talented 20-year-old was in talks to extend his stay at the Amex - and the club have now confirmed Tariq Lamptey has committed to fresh terms.
articles.content:
Brighton have confirmed young defender Tariq Lamptey has signed a new long-term deal at the club.

articles.title: Marseille boss Andre Villas-Boas confirms Premier League interest in Morgan Sanson - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sportsmail reported on Saturday that Villa had opened talks for a deal for the former France U21 international, joining West Ham, Tottenham and Arsenal in the race for the versatile midfielder.
articles.content:
Marseille manager Andre Villas-Boas has confirmed interest from the Premier League for midfielder Morgan Sanson after Aston Villa joined a host of other clubs in the race for the £20m-rated star.
